articles.author: Stefan Wolff
articles.title: After another call with Putin, it looks like Trump has abandoned efforts to mediate peace in Ukraine - The Conversation
articles.description: Trump informs Ukraine and its European allies that the war is now solely their problem to solve.
articles.content: After a two-hour phone call with Russian leader Vladimir Putin on May 19, US president Donald Trump took to social media to declare that Russia and Ukraine will immediately start negotiations towards… [+5613 chars]

articles.author: Giorgio Leali, Paul de Villepin, James Fernyhough
articles.title: Macron and Merz call to abolish EU law on ethical supply chains - politico.eu
articles.description: Leaders of Europe’s two most powerful countries ramp up EU’s pro-business, anti-green push by calling for repeal of due diligence rule.
articles.content:
Macrons comments followed a similar statement from German Chancellor Friedrich Merz, who called for complete repeal of the directive on a visit to Brussels earlier this month.
